caption:
As the face of this year’s Met Gala, model #ChristianLatchman personified the essence of Superfine: Tailoring Black Style—a tribute to the legacy of Black dandyism. Celebrity makeup artist @nicolewittman reveals how she prepped his skin with iS Clinical to bring this vision to life:

"This moment was about so much more than glam. It was about presence, strength, and graciousness. From the very start, I knew the skin had to lead the way. The goal wasn’t to cover, but to enhance — letting Christian’s natural radiance, confidence, and story shine through. Skincare was the star of this look. Every product was carefully chosen to nourish, calm, and elevate his skin, allowing it to speak for itself. Because today wasn’t about seeing makeup — it was about seeing Christian. What a privilege to be part of a moment where beauty meets meaning.

Today we made some Met-magic with my top skincare routine on the face of this year’s Gala, Christian Latchman.

I started by waking up the skin with a generous spritz of Copper Firming Mist — think of it as the skin’s morning espresso, hydrating and plumping it back to life.

Next, I tapped in the Youth Eye Complex around the eye area. This product smooths, soothes, and brings those under-eyes back to life like they just had 8 hours of sleep and a green juice.

Next, came my calm and collected friend: the Hydra-Cool Serum — a cool-down moment for the skin. Especially perfect for the guys, it calms, hydrates, and leaves the face feeling like it just went on a spa retreat without leaving the makeup chair.

And to finish, the glow MVP- Reparative Moisture Emulsion. This is my glow-getter, texture-smoother, makeup-melting BFF. It makes everything I layer on top glide like silk and leaves that flawless, camera-ready finish we all live for - especially for the first Monday in May."

#iSCLINICAL 
#MetGala
